featureDetail: Interactive game-play keeps you enterained and focused. Dull training videos from the 80’s are a thing of the past.
Train anywhere you want with your phone. No need to fall asleep in front of your computer or lug your laptop around.
Get your TABC certification in as little as 2 hours. Acces your certificate immediately and print it out to make your boss and the State of Texas proud.
Put your certification to work right away. You’ll get preferred access to national chains and independent businesses in our network.
Go beyond the basics. Serve up FOMO-inducing cocktails for big-tippers. Expert-led tips will take your skils to the next level.
